name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior SRE Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in cloud infrastructure management and automation, proficient in **GCP**, **GKE**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Helm**. I excel in implementing CI/CD pipelines using **Bitbucket Pipelines**, **ArgoCD**, and **Terraform**, while ensuring high availability through **HPA** and **KEDA**. My expertise extends to programming in **Python**, **GoLang**, and **Java**, alongside strong command over **Linux** (Debian, Ubuntu) environments. I have a solid background in monitoring and observability with tools like **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **OpenTelemetry**, and data persistence using **PostgreSQL** and **Elasticsearch**. I have successfully led cross-functional teams, mentored junior engineers, and driven projects that enhance performance, user experience, and accessibility. My commitment to technical excellence is matched by my ability to deliver innovative software solutions that meet complex user needs.
